plot: James goes to an interview for an office job and questions in the interview makes him look back on his memories and his 'real' dreams.
title: Lost in Memories
plot_es: James goes to an interview for an office job and questions in the interview makes him look back on his memories and his 'real' dreams.
plot_en: James goes to an interview for an office job and questions in the interview makes him look back on his memories and his 'real' dreams.
